Package org.apache.jackrabbit.jca

Class Summary
JCAConnectionManager This class implements the default connection manager.
JCAConnectionRequestInfo This class encapsulates the credentials for creating a session from the repository.
JCAManagedConnection This class implements the managed connection for this resource adapter.
JCAManagedConnectionFactory Implements the JCA ManagedConnectionFactory contract.
JCARepositoryHandle This class implements the JCA implementation of repository.
JCARepositoryManager This class implements the repository manager.
JCASessionHandle This class implements the JCA implementation of session.
